text: satyavisvasikale, ninnal allahuvinre sahayikalayirikkuka. maryaminre makan isa allahuvinkalekkulla margattil enre sahayikalayi arunt enn havarikaleat ceadiccatu peale. havarikal parannu: nannal allahuvinre sahayikalakunnu. appeal israyil santatikalil petta oru vibhagam visvasikkukayum marrearu vibhagam avisvasikkukayum ceytu. ennitt visvasiccavarkk avarute satruvinetiril nam pinbalam nalkukayum annane avan mikavurravarayittirukayum ceytu
